item.source: Need the correct code for ice barrage

item.title: Need the correct code for ice barrage
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

Search for if (magicID == 1189 && playerLevel[3] >= 1) { // Fire wave ProjectileSpell(155, 156, 157, absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, npcIndex, EnemyY2, EnemyX2, 27, 1, 566, 4278, 554, 5, 1, 7); }
After the } in that thing above add this if(magicID == 12891) // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell) { if(playerLevel[6] >= -124 && playerLevel[3] >= 1) { if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 40)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 40)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(554, 60)==false)) { sendMessage("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell."); } else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 40)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 40)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(554, 60)==true)) { deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 40); deleteItem(4278, getItemSlot(4278), 40); deleteItem(554, getItemSlot(554), 60); startAnimation(1979); attackNPCSWithin(369, 39, 0); //hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(67); server.npcHandler.PoisonNPC(npcIndex); inCombat(); PkingDelay = 15; sendMessage("You poison and freeze the enemy!"); //stillgfx(369, EnemyY2, EnemyX2); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; } } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 124) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 125 to cast this spell."); } } If there is already something similar to that, only ice barrage replace it with ^^ that above.

No problem…

Read full topic

item.source: Need the correct code for ice barrage

item.title: Need the correct code for ice barrage
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

if(spellID == 12891) { // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell) if(castOnPlayer.checkHoldcooldown() == true && castOnPlayer.checkHold() == false && playerLevel[6] >= 94) { hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(30); startAnimation(1979); attackPlayersWithin(369, 39, 10); castOnPlayer.inCombat(); inCombat(); PkingDelay = 3; meStill(); } if(castOnPlayer.checkHoldcooldown() == true && castOnPlayer.checkHold() == true && playerLevel[6] >= 94) { hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(30); startAnimation(1979); attackPlayersWithin(369, 39, 10); castOnPlayer.inCombat(); inCombat(); PkingDelay = 3; meStill(); } if(castOnPlayer.checkHoldcooldown() == false && castOnPlayer.checkHold() == false && playerLevel[6] >= 94) { hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(30); startAnimation(1979); attackPlayersWithin(369, 39, 10); castOnPlayer.barrage(); castOnPlayer.inCombat(); inCombat(); PkingDelay = 3; castOnPlayer.sendMessage("You have been frozen!"); castOnPlayer.meStill(); meStill(); } if(playerLevel[6] <= 93) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 94 to cast this spell."); startAnimation(0); meStill(); } }

Read full topic
item.source: Need the correct code for ice barrage

item.title: Need the correct code for ice barrage
item.dc:creator: @teric6 teric6
item.description:
@teric6 wrote:

all i want is the main code for ice barrage–sort of like this but i want the ice barrage code…my recent ones kill my npc’s…can someone give me theire ice barrage code, like this…

if(magicID == 13023) // shadow barrage (lvl 88 spell) { if(playerLevel[6] >= -104 && playerLevel[3] >= 1) { if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 5)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(565, 5)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(556, 5)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(566, 5)==false)) { sendMessage("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell."); } else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 5)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(565, 5)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(556, 5)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(566, 5)==true)) { startAnimation(1979); attackNPCSWithin(383, 35, 0); playerLevel[3] += hitDiff; updateRequired = true; PkingDelay = 25; deleteItem(995, getItemSlot(995), 1); deleteItem(995, getItemSlot(995), 1); deleteItem(995, getItemSlot(995), 1); deleteItem(995, getItemSlot(995), 1); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; //server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].currentHealth -= server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].hitDiff; } } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 104) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 105 to cast this spell."); } } [br][size=1]Posted on: March 11, 2007, 09:39:39 AM[/size][hr]but for ice barrage instead…[br][size=1]Posted on: March 11, 2007, 09:40:01 AM[/size][hr]anyone? just a normal correct barrage…

Read full topic
